welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merrillville! This charming city is known for its friendly locals, beautiful parks, and delicious food. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porter County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Porter County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Michigan City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Michigan City Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.
